CutSceneText.Text: Come closer, hero of the Tijerid realm!
I can't bring myself to imagine what might have become of Tijerid if you hadn't been here.
Please forgive me for not listening carefully to what you said.
It's crazy that the beastly Orcs came up with the idea of pretending to launch a frontal attack but then actually feeding poison into the town through the underwater canals.
There's no way an Orc could have devised such a clever idea.
It can't have been the Orcs! I'm sure it was Yurid! As if his betrayal wasn't bad enough, he was hell-bent on wiping out an entire civilian population!
We may have defeated Orc Captain Shandu on the canal, but we did not actually see him there.
We need to dispatch all men to look for him at once!
We can't send out all our men for one turncoat. Anyway, all the men are exhausted after the battle with the Orcs.
Reol!
I spent a lot of time with Reol.
I tried to steer both of them onto the right path, but I think Yurid went astray because of my instructions.
I accept full responsibility for him. I will find Yurid and take him to task.
Bellus, calm down.
Yurid is my only brother. My brother was supposed to become a Daeva...
If my brother had become a Daeva, the situation would never have escalated like this.
Just leave this to me.
Yes. As you wish.
Oh, I'm sorry. I'd completely forgotten the heroic [%username], the saviour of Tijerid.
I would like to express my gratitude to you on behalf of Tijerid.
It was nothing, really.
Your gift will be waiting for you with Knight Telia outside the Audience Chamber.
It may not seem like much compared to your great deeds, but I beg you to be prepared to help us again.
